data.description: Our AI based speaker ID powers over 30 Million phones with speaker verification use case for unlocking phone and enabling voice commands. It is completely optimized for edge devices for low power and high accuracy. It is robust under noisy conditions typically found on home and office environments.
data.heading: MEEAMI
data.title: AI Speaker ID

cards.description: Our technology stands as a beacon of excellence in its field, boasting industry-leading performance metrics that are unmatched. With a remarkable True Positive Rate (TPR) of 98% and an astonishingly low False Positive Rate (FPR) of just 5% even in pristine, clean environments, our solution sets the gold standard for accuracy and reliability.
cards.title: Industry leading performance: 98% TPR, 5% FPR in clean environment

cards.description: Our solution redefines efficiency, demanding only minimal system resources to operate seamlessly. With a requirement of just 150 MHz of processing power, 4 MB of memory, and an incredibly low latency of 100 milliseconds, our technology is designed to maximize performance while minimizing the strain on your hardware.
cards.title: Low resource requirement: 150 Mhz, 4 MB memory, 100 ms latency

cards.description: Our technology is engineered for unwavering performance, even in the most demanding and noisy conditions. With a remarkable ability to maintain stable operation down to a Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) as low as 6 dB, it ensures that critical operations, communication, and data transmission remain steadfast and dependable
cards.title: Robust performance in noisy condition: performance is stable upto 6 dB SNR

cards.description: Our technology is engineered for unwavering performance, even in the most demanding and noisy conditions. With a remarkable ability to maintain stable operation down to a Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) as low as 6 dB, it ensures that critical operations, communication, and data transmission remain steadfast and dependable
cards.title: Beats Amazon and Google speaker ID under noisy conditions

data.description: Unlock the power of audio AI with our state-of-the-art tool designed to revolutionize your sound experiences. Embrace the future of sound with our audio AI tool and discover a world of endless possibilities at your fingertips.
data.heading: Explore
data.title: Try it now to transform your soundscapes like never before.

data.description: Our AI Speaker Identification use case is at the forefront of the evolving landscape of voice recognition. This technology has the power to uniquely identify individuals based on their vocal characteristics, providing a versatile and secure solution for a wide range of applications.
data.heading: Use Cases
data.title: Add voice security to banking services and smart home devices.
